thread.title: Trump trolls the Oscars on Breitbart
thread.title_full: Trump trolls the Oscars on Breitbart

title: Trump trolls the Oscars on Breitbart
text: show ad Trump trolls the Oscars - at last! President blames Best Picture fiasco on Hollywood being 'focused so hard on politics' President Donald Trump finally made fun of the Oscars ceremony, which was rocked by the wrong movie being announced as the winner of Best Picture Talking to Breitbart News, the president suggested the stars were focused so much on politics 'that they didn't get the act together at the end' Last night, Academy Awards host Jimmy Kimmel hit Trump hardest, mocking him for calling Meryl Streep 'overrated' and tweeting at him during the ceremony Published: 22:45 GMT, 27 February 2017 | Updated: 02:47 GMT, 28 February 2017 54 shares
